## Application - EU countries population growth

This application shows a histogram about the population variation between 2005 - 2016 of Austria, Belgium, France, Germany and Denmark. The user selects a country from a drop-down list and the histogram (together with the y-axix label) changes accordingly.

The repository contains three files:

* ui.r
+ server.r
+ README.md
+ help.rmd
+ EDU_DEM_23072019164604276.csv
